body.name: Balaclava Face Mask Adjustable Windproof UV Protection Hood
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 16. Order within 9 hrs 11 mins
features: ULTIMATE PROTECTION: This sunscreen mask is made of high-quality breathable UPF 50+ mesh fabric, super comfortable, lightweight, and durable. Protect your head and face from UV rays, dust, and wind, it is ideal for outdoor activities in summer or winter.

VERSATILE FULL FACE MASK: This mask is widely used as a full face mask, open balaclava, half ski mask, neckerchief, pirate scarf, skull cap, ninja hoodie, or sun shield mask. By wearing this balaclava under your helmet with sunglasses or goggles, it can provide you enhanced protection while you are sporting or working outside.

QUICK-DRYING and STRETCHY FABRIC: The high-quality material applied to the mask performs very well in terms of moisture-wicking, quick-drying, which can provide you with all-day comfort and keeps your face clean and dry. The hikevalley balaclava provides a longer neck area with extra length at the front for better protection.

MULTI-PURPOSE APPLICATION: The full face mask can be worn all year round. Whether you are hiking, cycling, motorcycling, running, mountain-climbing, hunting, boating, swimming, skiing, skating, snowboarding, or doing construction work outside, this multifunctional mask is eligible to provide you the optimal protection.

BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: While enjoying our balaclava mask, please also get some for your family, friends, or your loved ones as gifts for Christmas, New Years', Valentine's Day, Father's Day, Mother's Day, etc! If you have any size problems or you are not 100% satisfied with our masks for any reason, please feel free to contact us for professional customer support. The 1-year warranty is provided by hikevalley.
body.description: Why choose HikeValley Face Mask? We did not choose a random fabric similar to the mesh fabric. In order to ensure the high performance of our products, we have chosen a more expensive fabric with better performance in breathability, durability, and comfort. This fabric can effectively protect your neck and face from UV rays, dust or cold wind. Providing maximum value for our customers is one of the core concepts of our business. UPF50+ Mesh Fabric: 90.5% Polyester/9.5% Spandex Size: 420x250x280mm/18.9x9.8x11" Recommend Head Circumference: 21.26”-22.83” (54-58cm) Weight: 42g/1.5oz Features: Sun Shield, UV Protection, Windproof, Dustproof, Multi-functional

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About us HikeValley is a brand that designs and provides wearable protective gear for hikers. Now our products are not only designed for hikers, but also for those who love outdoor sports. HikeValley is still a small brand, but that doesn't stop us from always putting quality materials, personalized packaging and product durability first when making our products. We still got long roads to walk, but we will hike through the valley and reach to the top. Why choose HikeValley Face Mask? We did not choose a random fabric similar to the mesh fabric. In order to ensure the high performance of our products, we have chosen a more expensive fabric with better performance in breathability, durability, and comfort. This fabric can effectively protect your neck and face from UV rays, dust or cold wind. Providing maximum value for our customers is one of the core concepts of our business. UPF50+ Mesh Fabric: 90.5% Polyester/9.5% Spandex Size: 420x250x280mm/18.9x9.8x11" Recommend Head Circumference: 21.26”-22.83” (54-58cm) Weight: 42g/1.5oz Features: Sun Shield, UV Protection, Windproof, Dustproof, Multi-functional

FOR VARIOUS OUTDOOR SPORTS The unisex design balacalva comes in more than 10 colors for you to choose from. It is the perfect gear for outdoor adventurers of both genders. Whether running, hiking, biking, motorcycling, hunting, climbing or skiing, you'll need it to fully protect your face and neck. UPF 50+ UV PROTECTION This UPF 50+ UV protective mask can prevent UV rays from burning your face and neck while exercising outdoors. At the same time, it can also effectively prevent dust and mosquitoes so that you can enjoy the joy of sports without distractions MOISTURE WICKING & QUICK DRYING Made of 90.5% polyester and 9.5% spandex which absorbs sweat but dries quickly, keeping you dry and clean while biking, motorcycling, hiking, hunting or other sports.

EXCELLENT BREATHABILITY The mesh fabric is designed to keep your breath flowing, which is especially useful when you're in dusty places or exercising with goggles. If you want to take a breath of fresh air directly, then just pull it off under your nose. PREMIUM SEWING TECHNOLOGY The premium sewing technology ensures the elasticity and toughness of this balaclava very well. Even if you pull it hard, it will remain intact. If it gets dirty, just wash it by hand or throw it into your washing mechine. PREMIUM PACKAGING Packaged with our uniquely designed product bag, HikeValley balaclava hood is also a good gift for your friends those who love outdoor sports. Don't hesitate to show your love for them.
2pcs (Black + Black) 2pcs (Black + Brown) 2pcs (Black + Gray) 2pcs (Gray + Brown) Color Black & Black Black & Gray Black & Brown Gray & Brown

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This face mask is very well made and durable. The thing I like the most about it is, that's it's not too tight and very comfortable! I also like the packaging it comes in, because you can just put it back in there when you're not using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great material! Very comfortable.
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable and adjustable. Not too tight not too loose. Breathable but keeps face warm in the cold and cool in the heat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars great for winter biking
reviews.reviewText: Wanted a second balaclava in a fun color to wear fat biking in winter. I wear it under my snowboard helmet & goggles. If it is below zero, I pull it up over my mouth and nose. It does a great job keeping my neck warm. this 'clava is a bit smaller than the one that I bought several years ago, but I make it work. the main thing that has to move while I am wearing it is the mouth cover ("adjustable" part). IF my lips &/or nose start to feel frosty, I can easily pull the 'clava up over my mouth and nose. Later, I can easily pull it or flip it back down. I also wear it under a hooded coat or under/over a winter hat when I'm walking and snowshoeing. It is a great layering piece! I hand or machine wash/dry it after every use, and it is holding up well.I have also worn a balaclava while doing yard work to protect my neck and ears from poison ivy and garlic mustard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fit great, very comfortable. 10/10 would recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for full face motorcycle helmets
reviews.reviewText: I use mine as a mask to easily put on and take off my helmet. If you have mid length hair, it works great to keep the hair out of your eyes and ears if you slick your hair back. Price wasn't too expensive either. It's a little looser than I would like but it's not really that much of an issue. Just requires a little adjustment on the face after I put my helmet on. Would definitely recommend to any other bikers out there as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is an incredibly solid product, down to it being 32⁰F and windy out. Anytime I use it above freezing temperatures, I often have to take it off at some point due to it being so effective. Below freezing and I would maybe start considering something a little thicker, though.It can/will absorb your breath smell, just an fyi. Has a decent amount of material to help it stay under your collar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for cold weather
reviews.reviewText: The balaclava appears to be well constructed. However, the material is much too thin to be worn in cold weather. That said, if it had been built for cold weather I might have given it a much higher rating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice lightweight mask. Comfortable, can retain a little heat, and breathable.

reviews.reviewerName: oscar yibran camacho rizooscar yibran camacho rizo

reviews.reviewText: My son is very happy with it. Was a good purchase!

reviews.reviewTitle: Couleur qui est proche du rose pâle
reviews.reviewText: Déçu de la couleur. Le blanc n’est pas vraiment un blanc mais plutôt un blanc/rose.On dirait qu’il a été lavé préalablement avec des tissus de couleur rouge.
Se adapta pefectamente a la cara, realmente me proteje del sol
